post.body: im still at canal walk. I still have to take the bus home. Where is the open air today? Carnation Square?
wat up 2 bro?
you'll have to w8 nd c
hey there bqother
it sounds exciting. We definitely prepared for it. Its what we've been w8n 4.
r u joining us for open-air today?
the kids are enjoying it
r u seriously gona livestsream God Encounter over skype?
did u guys Ã¶t go with earl?
yes there is open air today
r u still goin with earl today?
i love it bro. Its my fav colour ;-)
gudnyt bro
wat tym nip tuck comin on?
and @mtheron14 just walked in. They coming to check out the article in local newspaper about http://thereconstructed.com/
wat is dota? lol
the article in Athlone News is brilliant except that they call us IDC instead of IDM. Lotsa exposure for the IDM website,m ...
no its ohk, i thought you were at home
can I join you later?
welcome back brother. Im glad you enjoyed your weekend away.
that was an extract from the Nelson Mandela inaugural speech. Have a blessed day
my greatest fear is not that I am inadequate,my greatest fear is that I am powerful beyond measure...
@brent007 @mtheron14 @craigross316 @bishopfortune Good morning. Greetings in Jesus name
Ephesians chap 4 vs 2, vs 9 til 16
@craigross316 we will be reading a couple of scriptures out of Ephesians 4: 2,9 - 16. Bless you.
will send it to you brother
Cant w8 4 open air l8r 2day
Waiting in line at steers for the food. You guessed it, Hectic Burgers
We will be disembarking the bus shortly
I quite enjoyed the bus trip to canal walk. Ij was bumpy but relaxing.
We just about ariving @canalwalk now
Rayaan geting a bit restless. He wants to run around in the bus. lol
We are in the bus on our way to Canal Walk.
Just made the boys cereal...
I need to get some sleep
Just got out the shower. Wow a shower does a world of good
Just gt home. Gona take a shower now then definitely gona relax
Picking up Bladen and Rayaan then going home to have a shower and just relax
Just waiting on @dumontc
Everybody @impactdirect centre is tired but had a wonderful day
We will be @impactdirect centre in a minute
Now traffic is free flowing. We are taking the turnoff at Vangate Mall
Guess what. The traffic was backed up because they were queing to get into Grand West
We are just passing Grand West
We are stuck in traffic on Vanguard Drive
Its gonna be bumper to bumper all the way to Bridgetown
Taking the Goodwood turnoff and the traffic is thick
Passing Parow turnoff
Just passing Durban rd off ramp
Just had seafood lasagne and prawn breyani for lunch. Hmmm thank you Lord for good food
The power of love is the one thing that is instrumental in effecting change in a persons life
Watching the Fernando Torres "El Nino" story on Liverpool TV.
Good morning wwworld. This ir the day that The Lord has made
G'night wwworld!
Wow is all I can say bout today. I had a blessed day. Thank you Jesus!
Just got home from the prayer meeting and my 7yr old wants to know all bout my day out catching crayfish
God The Father gives talents that we are born with, Jesus gives ministry gifts and The Holy Spirit gives spiritual gifts
The power of love is the one thing that is instrumental in effecting change in a person's life
We just waiting on @brent007 and neo316 then the meeting gonna start.
